samples.text: It's amazing how the stench of sulfur emanates from the TV whenever Wormtongue gives these fireside chats from hell.

Came home to a terrible smell in my bedroom with no obvious source. A simple problem, but not something many would recognise Sewer gas. Because I don't use my ensuite, eventually all the water in the traps dried up, creating an open pipe straight from the sewer into the house. Stinky gas go up.

Along with the sudden warming, residents of St. Petersburg were covered by a persistent smell of sewage, which can be felt in different areas of the city. City residents are complaining en masse on social networks about the unbearable stench.
